edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.planningpoker.view.active.cards

Class CardActionListenerRefactor

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.planningpoker.view.active.cards.CardActionListenerRefactor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class CardActionListenerRefactor
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    sets the ActionListener for each of the estimates. The "I don't know" button clears all selected buttons when selected and if deselected, previously selected buttons are reselected. "I don't know" button is deselected when an estimate button is selected.
    Author:
    Bobby Drop Tables
